content: great write John Fawkes. In my experience empowerment fails when only “responsibility” is given but no “authority” is given.This is a very dangerous situation to be in.You are caught for everything that goes wrong but you do not have the authority to make the right decisions and do what it takes to do things for the better. So if Leaders are seriously interested to empower their teams,they must also learn to let go their power and delegate it effectively to the person who needs it the most. True empowerment is taking charge of everything under the sun .
